gui.bteutilmod.confirm_changes:
For the changes to apply you have to restart you game.
You wish to proceed?
gui.bteutilmod.inst_cp:
Type §a[cp]§r to be replaced with your clipboard. 
Example: /tpll §a[cp]§r
gui.bteutilmod.inst_ph:
Type §6[ph]§r to be replaced with your player y value. 
Example: /tpll [cp] §6[ph]§r
gui.bteutilmod.inst_phx:
§e[ph___]§r can be used with a integer offset. 
Example: /tpll [cp] §e[ph1904]§r
 If your y=10 the command will be /tpll xx xx 1914
